explains: n. 间谍行为，谍报活动
wordGroup: industrial espionage 工业间谍；工业谍报活动

sentences.en: Espionage is a capital offence in this country.
sentences.cn: 间谍活动在这个国家是死罪。

sentences.en: She may call it research; I call it industrial espionage.
sentences.cn: 她可以称之为研究，可我称它为产业情报刺探。

sentences.en: It was a crime of espionage and carried the death penalty.
